text: Nassarius boucheti is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Nassariidae, the Nassa mud snails or dog whelks. ==Description== The length of the shell varies between 8 mm and 12 mm. ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Pacific Ocean off New Caledonia, Vanuatu, Fiji and Tonga. ==References== * Bouchet, P.; Fontaine, B. (2009). List of new marine species described between 2002-2006. Census of Marine Life. Category:Nassariidae Category:Gastropods described in 2004
title: Nassarius boucheti
